definition: food and drink/food to accompany wine
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
a dish that goes well with alcoholic drinks

sentences.english: what kind of snacks should we have?
What should not be drinking beer at the time to do tapas ?
sentences.chinese: 什麼不應該喝啤酒的時候做酒菜？

sentences.english: You actually like these trays to go with wine decorations with autumn.
sentences.chinese: 你和秋實把這些酒菜佈置好。

sentences.english: Mom has bought some fennel beans for Dad to go with the wine.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽買了茴香豆給爸爸做下酒菜。

sentences.english: Not to mention the perfect pal for your drinking needs is not far from a pork and kimchi stir-fry.
sentences.chinese: 當然用蛋包配上泡菜炒豬肉絕對是下酒菜的新寵兒。

sentences.english: He likes accompanying wine with beef tendons.
sentences.chinese: 他喝酒的時候喜歡拿牛筋當下酒菜。

sentences.english: They cooked these and served them with liquor.
sentences.chinese: 他們把這些炒了當下酒菜。

sentences.english: The factory chimneys vomited (out) smoke (all day).
sentences.chinese: 煙囪冒煙處，未必酒菜香。

sentences.english: If all this wining and dining doesn't do the trick, I'm in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 如果所有這些酒菜招待達不到目的，我可就麻煩了。

sentences.english: The stove chimney discharged dark smoke.
sentences.chinese: 煙囪冒煙處，未必酒菜香。

sentences.english: There is not always good cheer where the chimney smokes.
sentences.chinese: 煙囪冒煙處，未必酒菜香。

sentences.english: What kind of snack should we have?
The doctor told him to stay away from such foods and drinks.
sentences.chinese: 醫生叫他不要喫這樣的酒菜。

sentences.english: The sun was now breaking through a fine spread of cloud.
sentences.chinese: 我們的主人擺了一席精美的酒菜等着我們。

sentences.english: The doctor has given her some tablets to take away the pain.
sentences.chinese: 醫生叫他不要喫這樣的酒菜。

definition: tea and cake/refreshments/tea and dimsun 點心|点心, traditional Hong Kong lunch
appetizer/small side dish/easy job/piece of cake/see also 小菜一碟[xiao3 cai4 yi1 die2]
private room (in a restaurant, bath house, etc)
